Name: Feature_SuccessMails
Description: Whether to send Emails in case of Success

Name: Feature_SystemExceptionMails
Description: Whether to send Emails in case of SystemException

Name: Feature_InitExceptionMails
Description: Whether to send Emails in case of InitException

Name: Feature_BusinessExceptionMails
Description: Whether to send Emails in case of BusinessException

Name: Feature_NotImplementedExceptionMails
Description: Whether to send Emails in case of NotImplementedException

Name: Feature_ReportMails
Description: Whether to send Emails for run report

Name: Feature_ReportingQueue
Description: Whether to add to report queue

Name: Feature_Screenshots
Description: Whether to take screenshots in case of exceptions

Name: Feature_CollectTransaction
Description: Whether to collect transaction at init

Name: Feature_LegacyReportingQueue
Description: Whether to add to legacy report queue
